== SansDune ==
Clean curves and suggestions of sand dunes, without the grainy textures of sand itself. A comfortable level of abstraction.
 
=== Concept ===
When I think of the roots of <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Recent_African_origin_of_modern_humans|Humanity]]</nowiki>, I think about the Sahara (I really should be thinking about the Congo Rainforest, but I blame too many nature shows.) Sans Dune was insprired by thinking about sanddunes, the smooth bell curves molded by the shifting winds. It represents to me the fluidity, and the raw power of the Desert, our Origins, and Ubuntu. 

'''Palette'''
I use the default Inkscape Template.
